website_summaries.verdict: A very sturdy booster seat that secures dogs well, but harness may not leave them enough room to lay down comfortably.
pros: Well-made and sturdy, owners report that dogs are safely secured in this booster seat
Large clip secures dog’s chest harness well
cons: Can be time-consuming to put together and install
Harness system too loose for some dogs
Harness clip is too big to handle comfortably for some owners

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo seat
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the jumbo seat for my 30 lb beagle - worried it would be too small but it's perfect. Any bigger of a dog would be too small though. Securing it with the seat belt wasn't as secure as I would've liked - but I just used a bungee cord and wrapped it around the booster seat around the back of the car seat - won't budge now. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE M VOSEN

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Perfect for my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these booster seats. One for a 24 lb Bichon Frise, and one for a 7 lb Cavapoo. They are perfect! Very well made. The instructions to assemble were easy to follow, all the components lined up as they should. The strap to fasten the dogs in is very secure, and well made. The Bichon is an escape artist, and he squirmed the first time in the seat, trying everything to get out without success. I assembled them in the house, hooked them in, and tucked the straps under the seat (to secure) to give them a test run in the house prior to putting them in the car. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this car seat, the plastic base had to be bended (like everyone else) into the square position, and it was either in the hot sun or not made correctly because when I bent it the way it said in the directions, it literally snapped and broke at the bend. I sent it back to Amazon and asked for a replacement and the replacement did the exact same thing. I've lived with it and just duct taped it and it has been holding up. Do not recommend this to anyone with dogs that shed a lot either. I have a corgi and his hair sticks to the material and is very difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Small pet owners necessity
customer_reviews.text: My 25 lb pup is generally anxious in the car. This is a fantastic purchase for anyone with a smaller dog who is scared of bumps and constantly wandering around the car. He's totally calm and secure in this thing. The transformation is unreal! Even my boyfriend says this was a smart investment and he's difficult to impress. Traveling with the pup is now enjoyable and I can bring him on more excursions. I do wish there was a bit more comfy padding in this thing. The bottom pad seems really cheap and not very plush. If they corrected this, I would say this is perfect. Still worth 5 stars because of how miraculously it works. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: J.nice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 2 dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have a 14 pound Yorkie and a 20 pound pug. They fit in the Jumbo one perfectly. We purchased another seatbelt clip so both can be strapped in. It is a bit of a pain to thread the seat belt through, so I wouldn't want to be putting this in and out all the time. But definitely better than the one we had hanging off the head rest. This one is much safer for the pets. The pups absolutely love it too! =)
customer_reviews.author: Deven S

customer_reviews.title: This seat has a very noticeable downward slope. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures do not show this slope. I am not sure if I was sent a defective product or if it's supposed to be this way. The pictures do not show this slope and it's not mentioned anywhere in the reviews or in the assembly instructions. This is especially dangerous in a car. If anything, the seat should slope towards the back. Instead, it slopes forward putting my pet at constant risk of getting pushed forward by the force of movement. It would be especially dangerous in an accident. As soon as I can figure out how to disassemble it, it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: trollbaby

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to Put Together
customer_reviews.text: First, this thing is a nightmare to put together. Assembling the plastic frame is simple, but getting the nylon cover on proved to be an impossible, time-consuming task. Two people, two hours, and we never got the cover on correctly. Second: The machine stitching on parts of the seat were defective. For those familiar with sewing machines, the top thread tension was set too low causing big loops on bottom side of the stitching. Third: There is NO padding on the top edge of the box, it's only covered with a thin fleece cover. Fourth: This thing is going back ASASP.
customer_reviews.author: JLSmith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pup
customer_reviews.text: My pup absolutely loves her booster seat! She can finally see out the window and feel safe! The only suggestion I would make is to tuck the clip under the pillow when not in use. We have noticed it gets very hot if parked in the sun. Other than that no issues. Buckles much like a child carseat. I bought a large and it takes the entire seat. She is a small dog and is able to lay down comfortably in it and rest her head on the edge to see out. She is a bit of a clingy whiner in the car, since introducing her to the booster she no longer whines.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua can see out the windows now!! Pictured riding in a 2017 Nissan Altima. This seat is made from a thick, sturdy plastic frame. Each piece of the frame snugly pops into each other ... there's no accidental coming-apart theatres for sure. The fleece lining and pillow insert work perfect. Straps into your car with your seat belt - like a baby car seat! The safety clip itself is large and heavy-duty, but I think I will modify it to something else for my Chihuahua lol. I have a new harness ordered for her - so don't be alarmed by her being clipped to a collar. Love this seat!!
customer_reviews.author: moondress

customer_reviews.title: We Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love the booster seat. Eliminates the danger of dog hanging out window and perfect for recent 4 day road trip. She was able to see out window or sleep comfortably. Maishon is 26 lbs and about 19 inches long. We have the jumbo seat and any larger dog would not fit. We just got a second because it's a little bothersome changing from car to car but its worth the money. Regarding the unsafe comment, it's no more unsafe than any other booster seat. Common safety measures should always be used.
customer_reviews.author: Maishon

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together and install in the car. My girls love their new car seats. They sit high enough to see out the window, but its large enough for them to lay down on long rides. I ended up putting a blanket under the pillow it comes with to make it more comfortable. I also put a smaller latch on the tether that attaches to their harness only because they are small dogs and the latch it came with was fairly large. I absolutely am so pleased with this purchase they are safe and secure. My Samantha no longer cries in the car because she can see out the window now. Happy dog mom here!
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Overall very, very  nice. I would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly=very easy. The chair's construction materials seem to be of excellent quality. Cover material= I am satisfied. I have not washed it yet. Pad could be better fit, firmer better quality but it is not bad. The seat was easy to install but does not balance well in bucket seat I put a folded quilt under my dog's seat to balance it and protect my car seat. The dog seat height is EXCELLENT for my car . My dog can see out of the window with no problem. I am very well pleased. I will add padding under material on top sides for my Ozzy to rest his chin and head there while riding and looking out of the Windows.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyBird

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size!
customer_reviews.text: This doggy car booster seat takes up ONE seat instead of 1-1/2, and still fits my 26 lb mini Labradoodle comfortably. The plastic sections snap together and secure firmly to my car. I like the security harness strap that keeps the dog from being thrown forward inadvertently. BUT the provided cushion was inadequate. I FOLDED her CRATE CUSHION in half for a cozier ride ♡ My dog uses the original for a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: InGaltCa

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect fit for us
customer_reviews.text: I have a 17# poodle and a 10# Shih Tzu. They both fit perfectly together in this seat, which is what I have been looking for. They have plenty of extra room to move and they can both see out the window. I purchased separately, 2-tethers that fit on the headrest of the seat because I feel that it is safer than the tether that comes with it. If I needed another car seat, I certainly would purchase this one!
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: What we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We previously had a seat that hung from the headrest, but it wasn’t as secure as we wanted it, and it really wasn’t large enough for our 2 chiweenies, both 8 lbs each. This solid seat fits perfectly in the front passenger seat of our Nissan Rogue and high enough so that they can look out while they’re both lying down comfortably. The ledge is high enough that they feel secure too. The seatbelt secures the seat pretty good. They really enjoyed their first ride just now. The only things I’d change would be to make the cushion thicker and put some padding on the side walls.
customer_reviews.author: Punky Munky

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cuddly and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this and so does he! He can look out the window if he wants, or gets to cuddle on the pillow. I’m not super in to reading directions, so putting it together was a little tricky at first, but then I actually read the directions, and it was simple! Safe, sturdy, comfortable for the pup, and I like the plaid look. Would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: My puppy likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my new pup. Kinda basic looking but sturdy and it allows her to stay in one spot safely in the back seat while able to see out of the window.
customer_reviews.author: BrownCocoTampa

customer_reviews.title: Already had one of these
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and put both dogs in the front seat. They are not all that happy with each other so decided to get another and put both in the back seat. Success!! They both love them and behave well in them. They are very sturdy and the newer one has even better security features. Can't go wrong as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16lb miniature Australian shepherd and wanted something she could sit in and see out. It only one of us is in the car, and the booster can be in the "co-pilots" seat, you can make her lay there. But put it in the back seat, and no way is she sitting back there by herself. We tried the clip just once and she freaked out. The connection clip was so heavy it was like a chain pulling all the time. It took days after that one fiasco to even get her back into the booster at all. Guess we needed to have this back when she was just a baby ---she's 22 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeside Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a good seat- good size for my dachshund. It’s sturdy and easy to install. The only negative would be the pillow inside is very thin/flimsy. You definitely need to add another pillow or it is like sleeping in a hard surface. Every time he moved- the thin pillow would get caught up under him. I do like that it’s raised up so he can see out the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Bill & Tina

customer_reviews.title: Makes my dogs travel easier and happier.
customer_reviews.text: I was taking my dog on a trip that i wanted for her to be able to lay down and still look out the window and this works great. It also has a belt that attaches to the seat belt and hooks to my dogs harness. I had to slam on my breaks an it kept her in her booster seat. She has anxiety issues so she has trouble laying down if she can't see what we are doing so with this she lays down resting her chin on the edge so she can look out the window. She is a 30 pound dog and it fits her easily while laying down.
customer_reviews.author: becky WI

customer_reviews.title: The best car seat I have ever found for my 2 dogs! I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best car seat I have found for my 2 dogs! I have a 7 pound dog and a 10 pound dog and they both fit in it perfectly. The pictures don't show them hooked in, because I wasn't driving yet, but the hook that secures them in is also fantastic ( I purchased a second over the head rest hanging hook for my other dog -- this only comes with 1 hook). The design is perfect!! It fits on my SUV seat, and gives them lots of room to lounge and look out. It is well made, sturdy, and I feel like they are safe and secure -- it is also very nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: EmJE

customer_reviews.title: It's big
customer_reviews.text: This takes up the entire seat in my Mazda 5 and the pillow that comes with it is worthless because it's too flimsy and just slides around when the dog jumps in. I put my own pillow in it and it's much nicer. The carabiner is large for connecting to my dog's harness but I guess it has to be for strength. My dog wasn't happy initially to not have freedom to move around between the windows in the car but not jumps right into the seat when we open the door to the car. I like the sturdiness of it and feel confident that my dog is secure.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a cross country trip. It was perfect. My Lucy could look out the window and safely still be seated. I was worried about her being too big but nope at 16lbs a Westie fit perfectly. It doesn't come with a hardness but does come with a strap to connect. It is bulky. Doesn't fit bucket seats. This fits perfect in an F150.
customer_reviews.author: Map96701

customer_reviews.title: Big, sturdy and sit high enough to see out windows.
customer_reviews.text: Our Chihuahuas are happy little girls. We took them for a ride with us yesterday and they loved being able to see out the windows. Best dog car seats I’ve ever seen or had. They’re very roomy and very sturdy and safe. The carabiners that hook onto their harnesses are big and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Keren

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic doggy seat! Assembled easy within just a couple minutes. I did need to use a rubber mallet to get the pieces in but that makes me confident this is super sturdy. My 29 lb Frenchie fits in it well. He can sit and lay down with enough room. The only part that wasn’t the greatest is the pills they supplied. It’s not very thick and moves around quite a bit when my pup does. In going to get some foam a make a softer and tighter fit so it’s more comfortable and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Jjj333

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! Used it today to take my miniature dachshund to vet. What a difference. She was so relaxed and I was able to just drive with out the stress of what she would try next to get to me. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Kate Finds This Seat Comfortable and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Took my 2 year old rescue beagle to the vet in this seat today for her first car ride. She loved it. She was able to see out the window, and was comfortable and confident all the time in the car. I was happy because she was secure and not posing any distractions to me while I was driving. I feel that the vet visit went great in part because she was at ease and was able to see me (back of my head) while riding. Hope we have many fun adventures together thanks to this nice seat!
customer_reviews.author: Happy & Blessed Survivor

customer_reviews.title: Looks good to me!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together once I read the directions, LOL. It was easy to install, in about a minute. My dog was happy to get in and try it out. She could finally sit and look out the car window without sliding around in the seat.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: The instructions leave a lot to the assembler's imagination.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly directions could be more precise. A central component is bent rather dramatically in the package and the instructions do not make it clear that bending it in an opposite direction to maintain torsion that holds the basket to the support brackets must be done and in doing so will not break the seams of the component. The instructions should simply state that so the assembler will not be reluctant to torsion the component. The fabric that covers the assembled seat is very difficult to pull and tug over the assembled plastic seat. However, once the seat is assembled it seems to work well. At least my puppy has not complained too much.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D. Sternstein

customer_reviews.title: My shih-tzu LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: It's tall enough so that my shih-tzu can see out the front and side windows easily without even raising her head, and it also puts her right in front of the air conditioning vents, which she really loves. It's easy to secure it to the seatbelt, and it completely fills the front seat on my Toyota Prius C. It seems very well made and sturdy. It's exactly what I wanted for her. I got the Deluxe version, and was a little bit disappointed that the sides don't have any padding, but she loves it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: fackchekur

customer_reviews.title: Should be returned but I'm too lazy
customer_reviews.text: We found this bed really awkward to hook up in the back seat. The holes through which a seat belt threads are narrow and I kept scraping my knuckles. It really takes 2 people, one on each side of this product, so the belt can be picked up after being threaded through the hole on the far side. We have used a previous version of the bed with our cocker spaniel, but our new smaller dog can't get in on her own and doesn't like the loose pillow once we lift her up. I really should return it but don't want to have to take it apart and try to box it.
customer_reviews.author: PCK

customer_reviews.title: Check the width of the doggie seat
customer_reviews.text: I have a mid-size SUV with inflatable seat belts for the outside seats of the car, so I needed to put our cute pup in the middle seat. There was no way that was going to work with the length of the seat belt or the width of the seat. It appears to be a very nice seat, but I'm back to a seat that hangs around the headrest. I hope your experience is better than mine! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lauriloo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect for my small dog
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Toyota locking seatbelt it’s somewhat cumbersome to try and feed the seatbelt through the stand. I wish I purchased one years ago for my dog. He loves it and I feel better having him secure in one spot
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, seatbelt is strong and doesn’t slip, dog likes to see out the window
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My dog is a skinny cavalier spaniel 10ish lbs. she fits just fine, has room to move around. I had another car seat thing but it was too low for her to look out the window and the strap would loosen if she pulled. This thing is sturdy, hard plastic frame, the seatbelt is strong enough to keep her in the seat while I’m driving. She likes it better because she can see out the windows. Overall very happy so far. The thing is bulky and doesn’t exactly fit in my standard car bucket seats... probably would be better fit with suv seats. But it works and we are both happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! It sits high enough for a dog to look out the window and wide enough for a dog to stretch out. The pillow has reversible sides - one is a smooth side while the other has a bit of fluff to it. Assembly took about 10 minutes while it took less than five minutes to get it in the car. I already ordered another for my other dog and two extra so that I don't have to switch it out when I drive another car. The dog featured is Cody; he's a Pomeranian and weighs less than 20 pounds. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.Blackstock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a step up from our previous one that we'd gotten elsewhere. I like that this one has the seatbelt going through the leash part. In the previous one we had, the leash was attached to the seat itself and it eventually broke off. With it going through the seatbelt, there's nothing to break. Very stylish, looks great. If I had one suggestion it would be that the cushion were built in to the cover itself. This makes it soft and cushy even up the sides, and makes it so the cushion can't come out. Other than that, great seat!
customer_reviews.author: Annadolyn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and really lifts the pups up to see out.
customer_reviews.text: Like how sturdy and how it sits in the car. Don't like the slippery little pillow they have. My one dog loves to ride one not at all. This slippery pillow made it really hard for both to feel safe or comfortable. I put a rubber backed memory foam floor mat in there and it doesn't slide all around, it's comfortable and helps to make my puppies feel so much more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I used the Kurgo skybox for about a year and had it re sewn because it was falling apart. Was looking for something more durable that would last longer and this is definitely it. My only complaint is that in my suv it can be hard for my dachshund to see out. I do wish it was a couple inches higher off the seat AND that the liner was a 1/4 bigger all around, it was next to impossible to get it on the seat without ripping it.
customer_reviews.author: Iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Makes car rides easy
customer_reviews.text: You have to assemble it but it's very easy. Took my 20 lb westie on an 8 hour drive to visit family and he did great! The pillow that comes in it is pretty small and there's no cushion on the sides so I bought a bed to put in it from Ross and it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time figuring out how to put this together as the instructions that come with it aren't very helpful. Thanks to a bunch of Amazon reviewers posting excellent unboxing pictures I finally figured it out, and the final product is excellent. Feels very sturdy and my dog is so much happier in this seat which is high enough that she can look out the window. I feel much better that she is strapped in now too.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Plastic sides!!
customer_reviews.text: The seat has a plastic snap together frame which keeps it upright unlike other raised seats that will sag when the dog leans on the sides. It has a two sided pillow which can be washed. There are holes in the fabric and base for a seatbelt to pass through and it came with a nice heavy duty harness to clip onto the dog. My pup in the picture weighs 16 pounds and he fits in the deluxe perfectly. He loves the bed because it sits up high and he can see. I can highly recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: My 12-lb rat terrier always wanted to climb into my lap while I was driving, and she jumped out of the window and ran toward a busy road when I was at a pharmacy drive-thru, so I decided I needed a comfortable way to restrain her. We both love this seat. In my GMC Terrain, it is a perfect width for the seat, and the perfect height for her to see/stick her head out the window. The first time installing it was a little awkward, but it gets easier with practice. Taking it out is no problem. Overall, much safer and more comfortable for both of us; so glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: KARA CALLICOTT

customer_reviews.title: Travel happiness!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this. It took a while for him to figure it out but a 2 hour drive helped him realize it was super comfy. He hops right in and loves to pop his head out the window because he’s high enough. Love this. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: We are so happy now that our Maltipoo Caleb is safe!!
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this booster seat for our Maltipoo Caleb!! So thankful he is safe now as it is very sturdy and comfortable for him. One thing we did to get him accustomed to it was put his favorite play toy in the booster with him. He loves going for a ride and we know he is safe!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie

customer_reviews.title: A picture says a thousand words.
customer_reviews.text: A picture says a thousand words. After I took the picture (literally one minute ago) he is now sleeping in it. Took 2 of us to put together only because I don’t have fine motor strength. Make sure you know you’re alphabet. lol. I can’t wait to put it in my new car and take him for a ride! He will be safe in this very sturdy booster seat. My third picture shows just how well, not, his old seat worked.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: The dog found it comfortable and slept soundly for most of our trip.
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to assemble, however, the instructions weren't as clear as they could have been. I have a large SUV, and the seat takes up more room than I expected. I don't think it would have fit in my old sedan. We took a 2-day drive to visit relatives. My dog slept soundly for the entire trip from Florida to Wisconsin. On the drive back, she was less cooperative. She chewed through the restraining strap about 6 hours from the end of our trip. I was able to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda 517

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safety seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat for my dog to use on long road trips. I used it for a 6 hour trip recently and my little terrier/chihuahua mix Bella liked it a lot. She stayed in it the whole way without whining. It’s comfortable and allows her to sit up high enough to look out the window. Bella is 11 lbs. and this seat allows her to lay down as well. I love the seat too because it keeps Bella off my lap. The safety harness also ensures that she is safe while riding in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Sol

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I’ve bought to date for my pup!! Quality is amazing. Soft for him super secure for me. Love this item!! Only thing that would be better is to have a swivel attachment on the belt that hooks to his harness. The strap tends to twist when he moves about. Other than that this couldn’t be any better!!
customer_reviews.author: Mastiffmom845

customer_reviews.title: My fluffy girl loves watching the world go by!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 pound Shih Tzu and purchased the jumbo sized booster. Best decision ever! She would rather watch the world than try to climb into my lap. She is much more calm while in the car because she can see what's happening. So worth the money. Even my mom insists on using it now when playing chauffeur because of how happy the puppy is. And she thought I was crazy for getting it. LOL My only critic is I wish it came in more colors. I would have preferred a black fabric or a solid color.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it works....
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy seat for an active and long bodied Dorgi. He's just under 20#. The seat is a bit too high...dog can easily try climbing out. The restraint that came with it wasn't so great. I removed it and use a Leashboss dog car restraint, 26". Fairly easy to assemble, not so easy threading a rear seatbelt. This one stays in the car unless we HAVE to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: NurseCrystalB

customer_reviews.title: what I don't like and is very dangerous the"seat belt" does not secure ...
customer_reviews.text: The seat is high enough for our chihuahua and morkie to see out the window in the minivan. ..what I don't like and is very dangerous the"seat belt" does not secure to the seat at all. My husband opened the side door and thank goodness he was paying attention because Atlas leaned forward and my husband caught him. He would've gotten seriously injured. Also,getting the seat belt for the car through the seat to secure is a true pain.
customer_reviews.author: M. Karim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome dog seat...I take my dogs on some long drives... Last one was over 13 hours...their energy level and mobility were so much better when we arrived at our destination. My one guy had started getting car sick the last couple trips, this seat solved the problem. Recommend this seat for their comfort and safety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box due to flimsy plastic with stress breakage
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The plastic structure was already destroyed as soon as I opened the box. I didn't expect it to be cheap plastic on the parts which hold it together. Why they used flimsy plastic where there is a lot of stress placed on the item is beyond me. It reminds me of those throw away 7 day pill cases where you know the bit of plastic that holds the lid is going to break sooner or later, but you don't know when. Fortunately I know when on this! I would NOT recommend this to carry your precious cargo.. I.E. your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: Town and Country mini van
customer_reviews.text: I have an 18 pound chihuahua mix dog and she fits perfectly in this seat. Plenty of room to lay down and rest. Sits up high enough she can see out the window perfectly with no straining. The doggy safety belt hooks easily from her harness to the car seat belt and still gives her enough room while she's sitting to see out the window or lay down comfortably. It seems to be a well made sturdy but also plush elevated car seat. The cushion is reversible, one side for warmer weather the other is faux sheep skin for winter. We love it and feel my dog is safer riding in it.
customer_reviews.author: tenyb

customer_reviews.title: Was worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I have had it now for over 4 months and it is easy to install. Emmi loves it. She actually hates car rides and this gives her a sense of security. She doesn't freak out as bad anymore since getting this seat for her. It is pretty big, she is a 20lb Frenchie and has plenty of room. Well worth the money for sure. 1st one I have ever purchase and glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very bulky
customer_reviews.text: Very bulky takes up with of a person. It is elevated so a dog can look out the window while riding in the car. The dog is hooked by a black strap fastened to your car seat then attached to the dog collar or harness. The only safety factor is that the dog can’t jump around or be thrown around if in an accident. My pet weighs 16 lbs and it is just the right size for her. Wish the cushion was sturdier
customer_reviews.author: LME

customer_reviews.title: ... pups and I have to say that they are great. They were easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for our Mini Aussie pups and I have to say that they are great. They were easy to put together, are very strong, and were easy to install in the truck. I thought the clips were going to be too large to clip to their harnesses as they are just pups and the ring is small, but it wasn't. They were secure and happy sitting there looking out the window! And the strap is adjustable so I was able to give them just enough slack to move around and not get out. Not that they tried. I wish they made these a little bigger to accommodate them as they get bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Tina O.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dog booster for about 2 months now and all in all it works great and does the job. My dog loves sitting it in since he can look out the window easily. The only problem I had with the seat is the pillow inside was useless, very thin and doesn't stay in one place. I actually bought a small dog bed from Walmart and put that inside instead of the pillow that comes with the seat. My friend ordered this same seat and paid 10.00 more than I did and got a fake lambs wool pillow but it's not that great either. Otherwise I'm happy with the booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy seat. The plastic has a snug fit so when you assemble, be patient and take your time. I had to use a rubber mallet to help knock the pieces together. The cloth fits perfectly and I love that you can remove to wash it. My dog was somewhat okay in it since it gave him a nice view while riding shotgun. However, He kept getting tangled up, but that is the nature of a seat belt. I loved that it mounted by the car's seat belt like a child's seat!
customer_reviews.author: Howler R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves her new car seat. It helps her see everything and keeps her very safe. I was worried she would hate it...but i kept it in our home office with her favorite blanket and she hopped into it each day for a week. Then we tried it out for a drive to another city and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Doggie Car Seat!
customer_reviews.text: This standard sized car seat is perfect for my Corgi! Keeps him safe and secure in the car while giving him a boost to see out the window. What I love even more is that - after my Corgi ripped the covering while freaking out over me brushing snow off the car (he's a weirdo haha!) - Solvit sent me a brand new replacement cover. Solvit's Customer Service is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory King

customer_reviews.title: Very safe and the dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 5 month old Frenchie and they love riding in this booster seat. We purchased 2 seats, but for short trip we put them both in the same seat. I read people saying it wasn’t safe, that the security strap was not secure... we found it to be very secure, the car seatbelt threads through the security strap so it couldn’t be safer. The strap is adjustable so it can be fitted to each specific dog. The booster seat itself is secure as the seatbelt threads through the bottom of the seat. Everything is washable. Very glad we got these seats!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: A little tough to get together
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is the bed area. Ive had to line it with a sm lap blanked then put the thin pillow over it; otherwise the thin pillow slips all over the place irritating my Furry Family Member. It's VERY Difficult to get buckled into a car as well. We had bought this for Our truck, I already have a secure seat in my vehicle, which is from another company (easy to install and Very Well made). We ended up removing it from the truck and found it had made Deep imprints from the hollow Plastic design... we now use it as a Bed in the house! Not what id recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PixieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Safe, comfy and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat for our 13lb pug/chihuahua mix. The hard shell and harness clip would keep him safe in an accident. He sleeps comfortably in it, and loves looking out the window. It is very well made, the cushion washes up beautifully, and it is kept firmly and safely in place with the car seat belt. Bought a second one when we bought a new car so that he is safe and secure in either vehicle. Highly recommend this car seat!
customer_reviews.author: judie fezekas

customer_reviews.title: So far, looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and not hard to put together - do need to read the directions to get it together correctly! Seems very secure and solid. Looked at one for half the price that was all foam based - this is WAY stronger with the plastic snap-together frame. Soon I will get my puppy and give it a try. One of my cats approved the softness of the pillow insert! Up date. Pup is now 4 mo and 21 lbs. She loves her car seat and I hope continues to fit even past 30 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron A.

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful car seat for my little dog.
customer_reviews.text: This a great dog seat for the car. It made a huge difference for my little dog. She is a toy poodle that I adopted and she was very uneasy in the car until I put her in this car seat. Now she can see outside and is secure and comfortable. I had to have my brother-in-law put it together for me as my hands are not very strong. But it is easy enough to install it in the car and very easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kaloper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Took the trial run today and it seems perfect. My previous two from another company were foam core, but within a year, the foam deteriorated. Maybe because this is florida, it didn't help. I'd love to find a cover for these made of Sunbrella. Too hot for fleece here : )
customer_reviews.author: South Florida

customer_reviews.title: Shame on solving product boxing area!
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited about these car seats and got the first of two to gather. Went to put second one together and was shattered on both sides. Come on. This was so obviously done and then was packaged anyway. The Solvit company shame on you. Will be calling them. Makes Amazon look bad. Saying this the one of the two my dogs love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Comstore Card

customer_reviews.title: My dog used to get carsick!
customer_reviews.text: My dog used to get carsick until I bought him this car seat. I have a miniature dachshund and it took him a little while to adjust but he absolutely loves his new seat now. He can look out the window with ease and I love it because keeps him in place before he used to jump around from the front to the back and in my lap every time we stopped, he would try to dart out the open door but now he's strapped in and I can take my time getting out of the car before taking them out and most important he has not gotten carsick ever since he started using his car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 15 pound bichon - shih tzu mix perfectly. She can lay comfortably. More importantly, it works. I was driving on a busy street in rush hour when a car in the left turn lane decided it didn't want to turn left and cut in front of me. I had to slam on the breaks. This normally would have sent my dog flying off her seat. She was asleep and didn't wake up, She was completely undisturbed. The car seat didn't budge an inch.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. After lots of research, we decided on this booster seat/safety seat. It was pretty easy to assemble and it fits very securely in the back seat. I also use the harness belt. The first time I put Sophie in it, she jumped out and ended up hanging next to it (from her harness). But, she quickly realized you're supposed to stay in the seat and now she likes it. I love how high it sits for her. She has a perfect angle to see out of the window comfortably. I'm happy with this investment.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl9675

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dog travel bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Ever since we got our dog we have had her on our lap in the front seat. We never really felt too comfortable about this as you never know when something can happen. It took a bit of adjusting to get her to be comfortable on her own in the backseat but now that she has been on a few fun adventures she is completely relaxed. We bought a harness with a front lead and attach it to the belt. We feel very secure with her In this bed and on long rides she just cuddles up and goes to sleep. We will have to get another one for the other car now!
customer_reviews.author: C. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Love this. My min
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My min. daschund/chihuahua puppy loved it also and has lots of room to grow in the jumbo size (& put a blanket for colder temps. I felt this model was safer than most of the other "open" models since it is attached with the seat belt, and the harness attachment slides onto the seat belt itself-not the carrier (only through the it in back). Much safer this way especially if you use a safety harness. The unit itself is heavy duty, dbl-walled molded plastic, and easy to assemble. Very solid and do not foresee any wear & tear issues other than the easily replaceable covers. I did put a waterproof pad under the pillow that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: L D

customer_reviews.title: Wee Bairn and myself are impressed!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the box I was impressed. Sturdy pieces a beautiful soft cover and pillow. I am working from home so I took my “lunch” to assemble. I ended up calling customer service, which was quick, easy to navigate and knowledgeable helpful agent. Instructions didn’t tell me smooth side in! Maybe it’s jut me I thought the opposite and because maybe it was a given it wasn’t in instructions and I had fought with the pieces prior to calling for 15 minutes. Once I knew that it took less than 5 minutes and my Sheltie puppy has already claimed it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kelly Anne Saunders

customer_reviews.title: My Corgi loved it
customer_reviews.text: My Corgi loved it. He hated the car for the most part and got car sickness most times. My family and I drove from MN to CO, a good 14 hour trip each way and he did very well. He did get worked up when natured called but that's to be expected. This car seat was great for him. He could easily see outside both laying down and sitting up.. He nows gets excited for it when I take it out from the closet, he knows he's going for a ride. Quite the change from before.
customer_reviews.author: Micksta1962

customer_reviews.title: Not well cushioned for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: While this is clearly a sturdy unit, the hard edges could use padding on the inside. My 15 lb. Pom usually likes to lean against the back of the seat, but with this booster seat, the rigid material is hard that she gets uncomfortable and fidgety. The bottom cushion is also strange - more poly fill, not a firm cushion, so it slides around under her when she moves or when I turn corners. I expected a more firm, fitted foam insert for the bottom that would resist shifting. This booster seat may be perfect for smaller dogs up to 10 lbs, but for my weighty Pom I wish I'd put this money into something else.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Gail Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Super pet car seat
customer_reviews.text: This seat allows our dog to sleep while we are traveling. Every once in a while she'll wake up, look around without having to move, and go back to sleep. Makes traveling a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: We have a 20 lb, 5 year Maltese and he loves the car but he like to jump back and forth to and fro from the passenger seats. We are relocating to CA grom Wyoming and I need hom to stay in his own seat. This is perfect. It was fairly simple to assemble. I needed a little help from my husband to click the pieces in place. And the cover took me a few minutes to figure out but its beautiful and just what i was wanting
customer_reviews.author: Adriana N.

customer_reviews.title: An absolute godsend
customer_reviews.text: My dog got sick or would have an accident in the car every single time we went in the car unless I medicated him. I figured I would give this seat a try. It has been a godsend! He hasn't had an accident or gotten sick since I've gotten him this seat. He can see out over the hood of the car and he can see out of the window, which I think is important. He has even laid down! I never thought I would see the day. Traveling with my dog used to be an absolute nightmare, but thanks to this seat, it has become a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: ashes88

customer_reviews.title: The description is honest!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I give it all 5 is it fits and is plenty roomy enough for my not such great buddy chihuahuas. The only thing I changed was to buy 2 smaller seat belt buckles for their harnesses. The one that comes with it is sturdy for a larger dog. But I bought this too give my ladies lots of space.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but doesn't sit solid on the seat
customer_reviews.text: This is my first travel seat for my dog so I have nothing to compare but I'm pretty impressed with how solid the hardware is. The only thing is that the seat rocks back and forth when I brake and accelerate because it doesn't sit against the back seat. To improvise, I bundled a large towel and cushioned it between the dog seat and the back seat. This eliminates any shifting of the dog seat. My 8 lb dog now loves it because he can sit comfortably and look out the window without dealing with the shifting.
customer_reviews.author: malee

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: We have a Westy and she loves it. She went to it right away and in fact will jump in it when were getting ready to go. The seat belt is reasonably easy to thread through it. Once the seat bet is fastened it is very secure, no movement I would recommend if your dog likes looking out the window, keeping track of you. You do need a harness to keep your pet from flying doing emergency stops. Also, it was easy to put together. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: A pet safety seat to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: Seat belt locks the pet safety seat in place which wraps it located at the lower rear part. The thin pillow slides a lot on top of the liner. So I replaced it with a slightly thicker fluffy pillow and purchased a pillow case. Ease of install is not too bad. Figured it out quick. I have a 16 pound pet so she is able to sit and lay down comfortably. My poodle does less crying now. I think she likes it and her view to the outside level with the car's window keeps her entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Safe for Little Dogs Who Need to See Everythibg
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a rescue terrier mutt who needs to see everything when he’s in the car. My other pit bull mix just sleeps. I had to get something for a trip to the mountains. This worked perfectly, and now it’s where my little fellow goes for any trip in the car. The tether keeps him from getting loose.
customer_reviews.author: Just Sayin' 2012

customer_reviews.title: fantastic dog car/booster seat!
customer_reviews.text: This car/booster seat is fantastic ... easy to put together and install in car, sturdy construction with washable cover and pillow. I ordered the jumbo size for our 11 lb mini golden doodle puppy so he would have plenty of room to grow ... he can sit or lie down with plenty of room to spare. I recommend attaching the included small leash to a mesh harness so your dog will be safe and comfortable. Our dog loves this car seat!
customer_reviews.author: cjh

customer_reviews.title: A good system to have
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice size safety seat for our medium sized Boston Terrier. It was a little difficult to assemble and at times due to his movement in the seat, the fabric cover comes off and needs to be put back on. Otherwise, it seems to work to get him to the vet and to the groomer along with our two small dogs (a small Boston Terrier and a Yorkie) in a dual pet safety seat. I would NEVER travel without a safe system for our "little ones".
customer_reviews.author: IFLYGG

customer_reviews.title: Great product I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy we bought this car seat for our 10 pound morkie Sketcher. It was quite easy to put in and it’s very sturdy. The cushion in the middle is quite soft when he actually lays down on it as he is too busy looking out the window. Great product I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Our dog is much more comfortable in the car on long trips when he has ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is much more comfortable in the car on long trips when he has his booster seat to sit/lay in. We have a 30 lb cockalier and he used to be very nervous about riding in the car. Over time he has gotten over it, but the booster seat definitely helped. He no longer drools like crazy when we go for a car ride. The clip that attaches to his harness is also a nice addition and keeps him safely in the booster seat. Big enough to add a blanket or extra pillow for our little guy.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband assembled it and declared, "Gibby, our dog, will never ride or stay in this." He was so wrong, we strapped our little guy in and left for our six hour trip. He loved it! Didn't try to jump out or climb in my lap once. He was so happy being able to see where he was going and enjoyed looking out the side windows. Plus I knew he was strapped in and safe. Terrific product. Highly recommend. Your doggie will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: N. Canady

customer_reviews.title: A sure hit with my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I should say my dog loves it. Now he can have plenty of room and yet he is safe with his harness attached to the tether in the seat. I feel better that I have him in the back seat of my 4 door sedan and he is safer than if he was in the front seat in the sling type seat I had for him. The pillow is loose which will make it easier to clean but it slides around so I may have to put velcro on the bottom of the safety seat and on the pillow to keep that from occurring.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safety and comfort for your traveling dog
customer_reviews.text: Our miniature schnauzer would not even lay down in the other car seat we had. Now he can look out the window and he loves to curl up and relax during even the longest drives. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Proven safety
customer_reviews.text: These fit our part Corgi and the French Bulldog just right. We were in an auto accident and our dog was secured in the booster seat. She was not hurt and the seat stayed in place. Note: the black strap that the seatbelt goes through is adjustable and this helped prevent our dog from being injured. We have 2 of these for our dogs and do recommend them. We would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 14 pound dog with room to spare. The unit is made of quality plastic and very firm. It was a little tricky to get the seat belt through the unit the first couple of times, but now that I have experience it is pretty easy to attach to the seat. Make sure you use a harness on the dog, NOT a neck collar. The dog can see out the window standing or laying down. He can also curl up and sleep. He really seems to like it. He took to it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY HARTWIG

customer_reviews.title: Sitting up higher in the car makes for one happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: We are snow birds so 6 months out of the year we travel to Florida and back and our dog goes with us and up to now she sat in the back seat and was not able to see out as she is a small dog. She was bored and not very happy! Now she sits up high and can see out and she is one happy little dog!
customer_reviews.author: jeanne s

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It's very sturdy. I feel a lot safer driving knowing my puppy is contained in one spot, comfortable and not jumping all over the place. And I like knowing that he's safe. He seems to like looking out the window and he seems to feel more comfortable sitting/laying on a flat stable spot rather than a lap. I did fold a towel to lay on top of the pillow just to help keep him from chewing up the pillow and help keep it clean. It was definitely a purchase I'm glad I made! Now I can't wait to make the six hour drive home to visit family and show off my puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves the car using this seat
customer_reviews.text: Our 13 pound puppy loves this seat. Easy to assemble, very easy to put in the car and to remove. Will work well for dogs up to about 25 pounds. Looks like it is easy on the car seat, but worth adding some protection (like a towel) if you want to be sure. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a Happy travel buddy !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs- miniature weiner, minpin and a jack Russell that LOVE the 2 booster seats I put in the back of my Volkswagen bug.! The young Jack Russell had high anxiety traveling in the back seat. His problem is NO MORE now that he is up higher and can see out the window !!!
customer_reviews.author: carol a ogloza

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as a doggie bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Our Maltypoo "Buddy" just loves this seat. Allows him to see out the car windows and be a part of the activities going on in the car. totally calmed him down from the howling mess he was during other car rides. He likes it so much he sleeps in it when we move it in the house - even out of his indoor kennel. Highly recommend this safety seat.
customer_reviews.author: David Eisenhauer

customer_reviews.title: Why such great reviews for this?
customer_reviews.text: Hard as a rock. The sides look "padded" and the seat comes with a "pillow." But if the pillow provided is a pillow, then I'm a cantaloupe. Adding our own pillows and blankets helps. But as it is sold, my dogs won't use it. They would rather lie on the vehicle's soft car seat and see nothing than sit in this thing and see everything. For $60 I should have made a different, better choice.
customer_reviews.author: VM

product_meta.title: PetSafe Happy Ride Jumbo Booster Seat for Dogs - Elevated Pet Bed for Cars, Trucks and SUVs - Multiple Styles, Includes Tether
product_meta.description: Style:Quilted TanRelax and enjoy the ride with your best friend on board with the PetSafe Happy Ride Quilted Dog Safety Seat. This dedicated car seat for dogs makes car rides safer by connecting securely to one of your vehicle’s seat belts. The included Happy Ride Seat Belt Tether attaches your dog’s harness to the seat belt (for optimal safety we recommend using a crash-tested Happy Ride Safety Harness, sold separately). The sturdy, rigid frame is easy to assemble and install in the front or back seat of any car, truck or SUV with seat belts. The strong, lightweight plastic panels lock together with no tools required. The special 9-inch high raised seat platform makes this a dog booster seat too, so even small dogs are able to see out the window and safely feel the breeze. The safety seat supports furry friends up to 30 pounds so they can relax and enjoy sleeping the miles away on the comfy quilted liner and cushion. Because your pup is safely secured in his special spot, your seats are protected from pet hair and scratches. If the removeable liner is ready to be cleaned at the end of a fun-filled day with your best friend, simply toss the liner into your washing machine. PetSafe brand is here to help you and your pet live happy together.
feature_bullets: SAFE TRAVEL: Protect your pup with his own car seat; strap in and buckle up with the included Happy Ride Seat Belt Tether; for maximum safety, use the Happy Ride Safety Harness (sold separately)
STRONG AND STURDY: Rigid plastic frame is easy to put together; pieces snap in place without tools; strong but lightweight; easy to install on any bucket or bench seat; supports dogs up to 30 pounds

COMFORTABLE RIDE: Includes quilted liner and a pillow to cushion your pet; provides security and stability to relieve anxiety and motion sickness in the car; perfect for relaxing or naps on long trips
EASY TO CLEAN: Removable cover is machine-washable; keep roaming or restless dogs secure to protect your fabric or leather seats from pet hair, scratches and messes
DIMENSIONS: Interior seat measures 14 inches long x 18 inches wide x 8 inches high; total exterior dimensions are 22 inches long x 17 inches wide x 17 inches high
QUALITY GUARANTEED: PetSafe brand has been a trusted global leader in pet behavior, containment and lifestyle innovations for nearly 30 years; we help pets and their people live happily together
U.S.-BASED CUSTOMER CARE:  Let our pet product experts help; we’re available Monday through Saturday to answer your questions at 1-800-845-3274
FORMERLY SOLVIT BRAND - Packaging may vary
